    • Method Detail

      • addListener

        public static void addListener(ElPollo.Packages.Listener listener,
               java.lang.String... pkgs)
        Add a new package load listener.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener is called when a new package is loaded.
        pkgs - Variable list of packages to listen for,
        may be empty to listen for every package (this is strongly discouraged).
